docs.snippet: The tub Zouave, Capt. William Woods, towed in the ship Bedford, just arrived from London, yesterday afternoon, and at 3:10 o'clock was laying to off Quarantine....
docs.lead_paragraph: The tub Zouave, Capt. William Woods, towed in the ship Bedford, just arrived from London, yesterday afternoon, and at 3:10 o'clock was laying to off Quarantine.

headline.main: FOUR MEN BADLY SCALDED.; EXPLOSION OF A BOILER ON THE TUGBOAT ZOUAVE.

docs.snippet: OSWEGO, N.Y., Nov. 19. Monday night's disaster, while not as serious as at first reported, is one of the worst that has over occurred on this lake. The loss of life, which was at first reported at 31 persons, is now found to be only six....
docs.abstract: Seymour and Tow Lost on Lake Ontario; 6 Deaths
docs.lead_paragraph: OSWEGO, N.Y., Nov. 19. Monday night's disaster, while not as serious as at first reported, is one of the worst that has over occurred on this lake. The loss of life, which was at first reported at 31 persons, is now found to be only six.

headline.main: THE DISASTER ON THE LAKE; SIX LIVES AND THREE VESSELS LOST. FULL DETAILS OF THE WRECKING OF THE TOW STORIES OF THE STRUGGLE FOR LIFE BY TWO OF THE SURVIVORS VALUE OF THE PROPERTY LOST.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 26.-The Signal Corps observer at Barnegat, N. J., reports to the Chief Signal Officer, at 9:40 P. M., as follows : The schooner David H. Tolck came ashore about 3 A. M. six miles south of station....
docs.abstract: David H. Tolck; Charges Against the Life-saving Service
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 26.-The Signal Corps observer at Barnegat, N. J., reports to the Chief Signal Officer, at 9:40 P. M., as follows : The schooner David H. Tolck came ashore about 3 A. M. six miles south of station.

headline.main: DYING IN A WRECK'S RIGGING.; LOSS OF A SCHOONER NEAR BARNEGAT-SIX PERSONS, INCLUDING A CHILD, RESCUED IN A DYING CONDITION-A WOMAN DEAD IN THE RIGGING.

docs.snippet: Mr. William C. Underwood, the heroic pilot of the ill-fated steamer A.O. Donnally, which burned to the water's edge below Cairo last Friday evening, resides in our sister city of Newport, and reached his home on Monmouth-street yesterday morning. ...

headline.main: PILOT UNDERWOOD.; HIS MODEST STORY OF HOW HE SAVED:THE LIVES OF THE PASSENGERS ON THE STEAMER A.C. DONNALLY.

docs.snippet: LONDON, June 2. The Press Association has a telegram from Liverpool stating that the Williams  Guion steamer Idaho went ashore in a fog near the Koningbeg Light-ship, on the coast of Ireland, and afterward foundered. The crew and passengers were s...
docs.abstract: Idaho: (Williams & Guion Line:) Cargo Lost; all Lives Saved
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 2. The Press Association has a telegram from Liverpool stating that the Williams Guion steamer Idaho went ashore in a fog near the Koningbeg Light-ship, on the coast of Ireland, and afterward foundered. The crew and passengers were saved.

headline.main: ANOTHER STEAM-SHIP LOST.; FOUNDERING OF THE IDAHO SHE RUNS ASHORE OFF THE IRISH COAST DURING A FOG ALL THE PASSENGERS AND THE CREW SAVED DESCRIPTION OF THE VESSEL THE SALOON LIST. THE NEWS OF THE WRECK CONFIRMED.
